title: Dev Blog: Visual Effects in League of Legends

replies.body: Because riot keep talking about how they make their champions and they want everyone to understand, I personally thought that this was quite interesting.
Because some people care about this kind of stuff, like myself. Please clear off and stay out of the comments if you are here just to plague them with toxicity.
Way to be a prick there, ... Was going to say your name here, but nah. Terrible name you have.
What about ultimate skins how do you 'do'/create those ones?? Must be difficult...{{champion:77}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:37}}
Finally! News of a Rumble visual update, Amirite {{champion:68}}
the corki update looks amazing! so much better than the original

0.0 Looking at those minions i just think how amazing a sandbox custom game mode would be. Before the game starts you get to vary how many towers/minions spawn and stuff. Imagine if minions were {{champion:31}} sized and spawned every 10 seconds. :D *Wets pants*
Some love for brand, now a new skin? <3 {{champion:63}}
